timeline.message:
Remove Redundant Translog Fsync

All spots using this method would do a fsync with metadata afterwards
so we might as well do a full fsync right away and save a redundant
fsync + re-opening the file.

timeline.bodyText: This is also used by TranslogWriter.writeCheckpoint(), where there is no need to fsync the metadata (and we should not for performance reasons).
timeline.author: henningandersen
